title: Monitor Top Retailers Market Activity
description: Generate and maintain an automated dashboard tracking top retailers' digital presence and market activities
example_prompt:
1. Search the web for the top 5 most popular retailers.
2. For each identified retailer, generate a comprehensive report on each retailer's:
* Website updates
* New product launches
* Social media engagement
* Recent customer reviews
* Press mentions
3. Generate an HTML dashboard based on findings for each retailer
4. Open the dashboard in a browser
5. Automation Script to pull new results every 30 days

environmentVariables.name: dashboard_path
environmentVariables.description: Path where the dashboard HTML should be saved

environmentVariables.name: num_retailers
environmentVariables.description: Number of top retailers to monitor

environmentVariables.name: update_frequency
environmentVariables.description: How often to update the dashboard in days

environmentVariables.name: search_type
environmentVariables.description: Tavily Web Search type (comprehensive or news)
